events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info hasn't updated in days and I'm worried about the delay.
The system has classified the reported problem under 'Delivery Delay' based on keywords related to late shipment and tracking issues.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle this delivery delay case to provide personalized assistance.
Hello! I'm sorry to hear your order hasn't arrived yet. Iâ€™m here to help resolve this delivery delay for you as quickly as possible.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the status of your package for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and the shipping address is 456 Elm Street, Apartment 12B, Springfield.
I have checked with the courier company and your package is delayed due to a transit issue. We will prioritize your delivery and expect it to arrive within 3 business days.
Thank you for the update and for prioritizing my delivery, I appreciate the quick help on this matter.
We have resolved the delivery delay issue and your package is now set for expedited delivery. You will receive a tracking update shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that your order has arrived. Please let us know if everything is satisfactory or if you need further assistance.
Yes, the package arrived today and everything is perfect. Thank you very much for your help!
We have sent you a short satisfaction survey regarding your recent support experience. Your feedback is highly appreciated.
I completed the survey and gave positive feedback about the prompt support and resolution provided by your team.
The delivery delay case has been formally closed following the successful receipt of the order and positive feedback from the customer.
This case has been archived automatically after 30 days of closure, ensuring all records are securely stored for future reference.
